segments.text: Where are you going for your holidays , Charles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To Australia . I'm going to visit my uncle in Brisbane for three weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good gracious ! You certainly are lucky . How are you going there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By air , of course . It takes over two weeks to go by sea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I once went to Singapore by air . It was very exciting-but never again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For a short time . One of the engines caught fire .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He put it out and flew back to the airport . Then he asked the people at the airport where the emergency runway was .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we did . But I shall never fly again .
segments.speaker: S1
